revised_title: Isotope Shifts in the Arc Spectrum of Xenon: A Study of Field and Mass-Shifts
tldr: The authors measured isotope shifts in the arc spectrum of xenon to study the effects of field and mass-shifts. They found significant differences in the isotope shifts for various lines, with field-shifts and specific mass-shifts varying between different lines. The results provide insights into the behavior of atomic spectra and help improve the understanding of atomic structure and interactions.
